languages.text: {n}Старик дает знак другим мятежникам — они опускают оружие. Затем, стараясь сдерживать слезы, мужчина переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Что теперь с нами будет?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик дает знак другим мятежникам — они опускают оружие. Затем, стараясь сдерживать слезы, мужчина переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Что теперь с нами будет?"

languages.text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"
languages.original_text: {n}Старик дает знак другим мятежникам — они опускают оружие. Затем, стараясь сдерживать слезы, мужчина переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Что теперь с нами будет?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"
{n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"
{n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"
{n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"
{n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"
{n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann gibt den anderen Aufständischen ein Zeichen. Sie senken ihre Waffen. Dann richtet er seinen Blick auf dich. Er bemüht sich, die Tränen zurückzuhalten.{/n} "Was geschieht nun mit uns?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann gibt den anderen Aufständischen ein Zeichen. Sie senken ihre Waffen. Dann richtet er seinen Blick auf dich. Er bemüht sich, die Tränen zurückzuhalten.{/n} "Was geschieht nun mit uns?"

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard adresse un geste aux autres insurgés, qui baissent leurs armes. Puis il se tourne vers vous, en tentant de retenir ses larmes.{/n} « Qu'allons-nous devenir maintenant ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieillard adresse un geste aux autres insurgés, qui baissent leurs armes. Puis il se tourne vers vous, en tentant de retenir ses larmes.{/n} « Qu'allons-nous devenir maintenant ? »

languages.text: {n}老人朝其他叛乱分子做了个手势，让他们放下武器。随后，他看向你，努力忍住眼泪。{/n}“那现在，我们该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人朝其他叛乱分子做了个手势，让他们放下武器。随后，他看向你，努力忍住眼泪。{/n}“那现在，我们该怎么办？”

languages.text: {n}老人は他の反乱者たちに合図し、彼らは武器を下げた。そして、彼はあなたに視線を移し、涙をこらえようとしている。{/n}「私たちは、これからどうなるのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は他の反乱者たちに合図し、彼らは武器を下げた。そして、彼はあなたに視線を移し、涙をこらえようとしている。{/n}「私たちは、これからどうなるのですか？」

languages.text: {n}El anciano hace un gesto a los otros insurgentes, que bajan sus armas. Luego te mira a ti, intentando contener las lágrimas.{/n} «¿Qué nos va a pasar?».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano hace un gesto a los otros insurgentes, que bajan sus armas. Luego te mira a ti, intentando contener las lágrimas.{/n} «¿Qué nos va a pasar?».

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı adam diğer asilere işaret ediyor ve onlar da silahlarını indiriyor. Sonra gözyaşlarını tutmaya çalışarak bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Ne olacak şimdi bize?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man gestures to the other insurgents, who lower their weapons. Then he shifts his gaze to you, trying to hold back tears.{/n} "What happens to us now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlı adam diğer asilere işaret ediyor ve onlar da silahlarını indiriyor. Sonra gözyaşlarını tutmaya çalışarak bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Ne olacak şimdi bize?"
